title: Blue Cloner Diamond 6.10.721 + Serial Patch
description:
Blu-Cloner Diamond is powerrful Blue-Ray copy, burning, decryption and conversion software. It has all the features of Blue-Cloner Plus the ability to burn data/video files to DVD or Blue-Ray Disc and rip Blue-Ray movies to various video and audio formats for enjoying on popular media devices. It enables you to copy Blue-Ray movies to blank Blue-Ray DVD Disc's or to the hard disk and convert 2D movies to 3D format. Besides, you can convert video files to DVD/Blue-Ray video format for playback on various DVD/Blue-Ray players. Give it a try and you'll find your ideal multimedia solution!

Blue-Cloner 6 enables you to make perfect 1:1 Blue-Ray copy, movie complete copy, split copy and customized copy. It also works as Blue-Ray player software for you to preview every movie title to avoid unexpected errors and mistakes. It will be comnstantly updated to remove latest protections and compatible with all Blue-Ray burners and Blue-Ray disc's. With the optimized reading speed and wizard interfaces, Blue-Ray copy will be finished just after a cup of coffee.


Key features: 

- Express interface and Expert interface: The express interface is for novices to copy Blue-Ray movies with just one click and the Expert interface is for advanced users to copy Blue-Ray movies with various customized modes.

- The improved interdface enables both new and professional users to view all Blue-Ray copy features at a glance.

- Removes all Blue-Ray copy protections including AACS, BD+, newest MKB v26, bus encryption, BD-Live and UOPs,. Note: Internet connection is necessary for Blue-Ray disc backup.

- Supports all regions (A, B, C).

- Perfect 1:1 Blue-Ray copy.

- Movie-only copy - copies the main movie only, omitting menu's and unwanted special features such as bonus mateerial, audio tracks and subtitles.

- Compresses the main movie with MPEG-2 or H.264 1080p to a BD-R/RE (25G).

- Splits one Blue-Ray movie (50G) to two blank BD-R/REs (25G).

- Custumized copy - Select only your desired movie title(s) to copy and remove the unwanted audio track(s) and subtitle(s) for every selected movie title.

- Copies home-made Blue-Ray disc's, backs up home-made Blue-Ray folders/ISO files to BD-R/RE with various Blue-Ray copy modes.

- Copies a Blue-Ray movie to DVD/AVCHD disc (playback only in a Blue-Ray player or player software such as PowerDVD) to save your valuable Blue-Ray disc.

- Supports the acceleration of CUDA and DXVA 2.

- Supports the Acceleration of latest graphics with higher H.264 encoding speed.

- Makes multiple Blue-Ray copies within one entire Blue-Ray copy process.

- Fully compatible with Windows 10 and Windows 8.1.



What's new:

- The improved interface enables both new and professional users to view all Blue-Ray copy features at a glance.

- Supports all regions (A, B, C).

- There is no need to install a Thirt Party driver, since internal UDF 2.50 parseer is included to read Blue-Ray.

- Supports for making a perfect 1:1 copy of the original 3D Blue-Ray disc's.

- Enjoy your original Blue-Ray movie directly with Blue-Cloner and don't need to install other Blue-Ray player software.

- Copies home-made Blue-Ray disc's, backs up home-made Blue-Ray folders/ISO files to BD-R/RE with various Blue-Ray copy modes.

- Set the DVD encoding fiormat, PAL or NTSC.

- Supports the acceleration of latest graphics cards with higher H.264 encoding speed
